title: The Cottonseed
brief_description: Set in the northern plains of Nigeria the film shows the main stages in the growth of cotton, and gives a glimpse of the cotton ginning process, before ending with an account of the uses of the oilseed crop.
description: Set in the northern plains of Nigeria the film shows the main stages in the growth of cotton, and gives a glimpse of the cotton ginning process, before ending with an account of the uses of the oilseed crop.
